00039 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlSubmitForm::perform(){
00040   bool ret=false;
00041   LOGI("Performing CurlSubmitForm action...");
00042   if (controlBefore()){
00043     // Control before success
00044     if (computePostedData()){
00045       // Compute data success
00046       if (submitForm()){
00047         // Form submitting success
00048         if (controlAfter()){
00049           // The operation is successful
00050           ret=true;
00051         }
00052         else{
00053           LOGW("CurlSubmitForm controlAfter() failed...");
00054           ret=false;
00055         }
00056       }
00057       else{
00058         LOGW("CurlSubmitForm failed to submit form...");
00059         ret=false;
00060       }
00061     }
00062     else{
00063       LOGW("CurlSubmitForm failed to compute posted data...");
00064       ret=false;
00065     }
00066   }
00067   else{
00068     LOGW("CurlSubmitForm controlBefore() failed...");
00069     ret=false;
00070   }
00071   return ret;
00072 }
00073 
00081 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlSubmitForm::computePostedData(){
00082   return true;
00083 }
00084 
00089 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlSubmitForm::submitForm(){
00090   bool ret=false;
00091   string s=postedData.getComputedData();
00092 
00093   handle=curl_easy_init();
00094   setDefaultWriteFunction();
00095 
00096 
00097 
00098   // Curl URL setting
00099   LOGI("==> Setting the licurl URL");
00100   std::string s2=filename;
00101   // Penser au 0 terminal              
00102   int len2 = s2.length() + 1;
00103   std::vector<char> raw2(len2);
00104   const char* str2 = s2.c_str();
00105  
00106   std::copy(str2, str2 + len2, raw2.begin());
00107 
00108   curl_easy_setopt(handle, CURLOPT_URL, &(raw2[0]));
00109 
00110 
00111 
00112 
00113 
00114   // Using a vector to convert string to char*
00115   int len = s.length() + 1; // null terminators, rah rah rah
00116   std::vector<char> raw(len); // or is that "raw raw raw"?
00117   const char* str = s.c_str();
00118 
00119   // Do not use strcpy, memcpy etc.
00120   std::copy(str, str + len, raw.begin());
00121   //  brokenCFunction(&(raw[0])); 
00122   // Assuming the C function modifies the input string and we 
00123   // want to return the
00124   // modified version
00125   //  return std::string(&(raw[0]));
00126  
00127 
00128 
00129   // Ajoute le cookie de connexion
00130   curl_easy_setopt(handle, CURLOPT_COOKIE, "login=true;");
00131 
00132 
00133 
00134   //  curl_easy_setopt(handle, CURLOPT_URL, this->filename);
00135   //  char* data="name=essaiCurl4&pwd=curl&pwd2=curl&mail=essai@curl.org";
00136   curl_easy_setopt(handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS,&(raw[0]) );
00137   curl_easy_setopt(handle, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
00138   CURLcode success=curl_easy_perform(handle); /* post away! */
00139 
00140   if (success==0){
00141     LOGI("The form was successfully submited");
00142     ret=true;
00143   }
00144   else
00145     LOGW("An error occured during submitForm");
00146  
00147 
00148 
00149   // Get the last response code
00150   CURLcode a=curl_easy_getinfo(handle, CURLINFO_RESPONSE_CODE, 
00151                                &serverResponse);
00152 
00153   if (serverResponse>199 & serverResponse<300)
00154     ret=true;
00155   else 
00156     ret=false;
00157 
00158   if (a==0){
00159     LOGI("Setting server response successfull");
00160   }
00161   else
00162     LOGW("Cannot get the server response");
00163 
00164   curl_easy_cleanup( handle );
00165 
00166   return ret;
00167 }

00177 void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlSubmitForm::setPostedData(
00178                            const char* key, const char* value){
00179 
00180   LOGI("Adding a Data to post");
00181   postedData.setValue(key, value);
00182 }

00188 const char* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlSubmitForm::getComputedData(){
00189   return postedData.getComputedData().c_str();
00190 }

00201 void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlSubmitForm::setPostedPwd(
00202                           const char* key, const char* value){
00203 
00204   LOGI("Adding a Pwd Data to post");
00205 
00206   HashPassword hp;
00207   std::string hash= hp.encryptString( value );
00208   postedData.setValue(key, hash );
00209 }

00231   postedData.setValue(key, value);
